page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAY
page.content: I am aged nine. I get up in the morning at half past seven. I have my breakfast, get dressed, have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I go to school. We do Maths in the morning and then have play-time. After play we do English and then we have dinner hour. After dinner we do Geography and History and then at half past three we go home. When I get home I watch cartoons on the television and then I go out to play on my bike. I play with my friend whose name is Martin. We play on a BMX track. When I get home I get ready for bed. At half past eight I read my book and then go to sleep.
